We collect mobile identifiers such as Android's Advertising ID (AAID/IFA) or Apple's Identifier for Advertising and cookies to conduct interest-based advertising, also referred to as targeted advertising or behavioral advertising.

text: We collect data about your behavior on our free Apps - such as how long you spend watching, and how often.
